ygData.subject: Re: Crit hits
ygData.msgSnippet: I am ALL for this.  I ve been thinking about trying to get a movement going for Monks to get Crits for a couple reasons. 1) the warrior patch kinda tilted the
ygData.messageBody:
I am ALL for this. I've been thinking about trying to get a movement
going for Monks to get Crits for a couple reasons. 1) the warrior patch
kinda tilted the pendelum a little to much to the warrior, i think they
are a bit more powerful than the monk. i believe that all that needs to
be done to make them equal is give the monk critical hits. 2) It make
far more game play sense that monks be able to score crit hits than any
one else. We study the body and know all the good places to hit and
have the body control to hit them.

That's my thinking anyway.

Trinak
Veeshan

--- "Josh G." <bleddyn@...> wrote:
> From: "Josh G." <bleddyn@...>
>
> Hey.. why don't monks have crit hits? Rangers just
> got em.. hell, rogues
> just got em too. Why not monks?
>
>
